column4: does anybody have a linksys wmp54gs wifi card working on ubuntu 6.1, i am having problems with ndiswrapper
its the pci card in the pc
ive tried, ndiswrapper doesnt work for me
my experience has been that I don't need NDIS wrapper... and I've gotten a few of my friends wireless cards just up and running by installing "Network Manager" for them from "add remove progs"
is it in the default repositories?
I haven't apt-get' ed it yet... I just used add-remove
it runs on my menu bar, next to the clock
and tells me what networks are availalble... before that I thought I needed ndiswrapper but turns out I was just connecting to the wrong networks, or sometimes just not connecting.
it says it wont run on my processor type (i386)
